name: NEI Enchantments
description: Replicates the X key enchantment feature from the classic Not Enough Items (NEI) mod. This feature allows players to easily enchant items using a simple GUI interface.

custom.credits: Special thanks to chickenbones for creating the original Not Enough Items (NEI) mod. The enchantment feature in this mod is inspired by NEI's iconic 'X' key functionality that made item management and enchanting so much easier in older Minecraft versions.

acknowledgments.NEI: Not Enough Items by chickenbones - The original mod that inspired this enchantment feature. NEI was one of the most essential utility mods for Minecraft, providing inventory management, recipe viewing, and the beloved enchantment GUI.
